prompts.title: Instagram Ad Copy Generator
prompts.deliverable: 3 Instagram ad copy options + 5 hashtags
prompts.quick: Write 3 Instagram ad copy variations for [describe your listing, event, or agent brand]. Include a strong hook, value proposition, and call-to-action. Suggest 5 hashtags.

prompts.title: 90-Day Inbound Lead Blueprint
prompts.deliverable: A 12-week marketing calendar + 5 ready-to-use post ideas + tracking setup
prompts.quick: Act as a marketing strategist for [type your city and state where you work - example: Austin, TX or Miami, FL]. Build a 90-day plan to get [tell me which type: buyer leads, seller leads, or investor leads] using [which platform will you focus on - example: Facebook Ads, Instagram Reels, or YouTube]. Include weekly calendar, KPIs, 5 hooks, UTMs.
prompts.success: ≥15 leads/week by week 6; CPL <$[your target cost per lead].

prompts.title: YouTube Channel Plan (12 Episodes)
prompts.deliverable: 12 video titles + scripts + thumbnail ideas + keywords for each episode
prompts.quick: Design a 12-episode YouTube plan for [who are you trying to reach - example: first-time home buyers, people selling luxury homes, or real estate investors] in [type your city and state - example: Austin, TX or Seattle, WA]: titles, hooks, CTAs, b-roll, keywords. Include upload cadence + thumbnail angles.

prompts.title: Local SEO Starter Kit
prompts.deliverable: Step-by-step checklist to get your Google ranking up
prompts.quick: Create a local SEO checklist for [type your city and state - example: Austin, TX or Portland, OR]: GMB, citations, review cadence, FAQ schema, location pages. Output priorities + timelines.
prompts.success: Rank top-3 for [service + city] within 90 days (leading indicators).

prompts.title: Listing Lead Magnet Funnel
prompts.deliverable: Landing page copy + 3 follow-up emails + 2 text messages
prompts.quick: Draft a 'Home Valuation + Market Update' funnel with landing copy, 3-email nurture, SMS, and retargeting angles.

prompts.title: Neighborhood Guide Generator
prompts.deliverable: A complete neighborhood guide you can brand and share
prompts.quick: Produce a neighborhood guide template for [which neighborhood do you specialize in - example: South Austin, Tarrytown, or Mueller]: lifestyle, schools, commute, pricing, 5 hotspots, map idea.

prompts.title: Open House Promo Pack
prompts.deliverable: Social post scripts + flyer copy + follow-up messages
prompts.quick: Create pre/during/post open house assets: IG reel script, flyer copy, sign-in CTA, follow-up text/email.

prompts.title: Referral Engine Email Series
prompts.deliverable: 4 emails asking for referrals (the right way)
prompts.quick: Write a 4-email series asking your sphere of influence (past clients, friends, family) for referrals and introductions: value first, social proof, soft ask, reminder.

prompts.title: Instagram Reels Calendar (30 Days)
prompts.deliverable: 30 days of Instagram Reel ideas with captions
prompts.quick: Build a 30-day Reels plan: hooks, captions, on-screen beats, CTAs. Balance education/story/listings.

prompts.title: Brand Positioning Statement
prompts.deliverable: Your unique tagline + 3 reasons why clients should choose you
prompts.quick: Craft a unique positioning statement and tagline for [who do you mainly work with - example: first-time home buyers, people selling luxury condos, or real estate investors] in [type your city and state - example: Austin, TX or Denver, CO] with proof points and voice guide.

prompts.title: Review & Social Proof System
prompts.deliverable: Scripts + reminders + plan to get more 5-star reviews
prompts.quick: Design a post-closing review capture flow: ask script, links, reminder cadence, showcase placements.
prompts.success: ≥70% of closed clients leave a review.

prompts.title: YouTube Channel Plan (12 Episodes)
prompts.deliverable: Table: Ep | Title | Hook | CTA | Keyword | B-roll | Thumbnail idea.
prompts.quick: Design a 12-episode YouTube plan for [who are you trying to reach - example: first-time home buyers, people selling luxury homes, or real estate investors] in [type your city and state - example: Austin, TX or Seattle, WA]: titles, hooks, CTAs, b-roll, keywords. Include upload cadence + thumbnail angles.

prompts.title: Local SEO Starter Kit
prompts.deliverable: Checklist with High/Med/Low impact + owner + deadline.
prompts.quick: Create a local SEO checklist for [type your city and state - example: Austin, TX or Portland, OR]: GMB, citations, review cadence, FAQ schema, location pages. Output priorities + timelines.
prompts.success: Rank top-3 for [service + city] within 90 days (leading indicators).

prompts.title: Listing Lead Magnet Funnel
prompts.deliverable: Page wireframe + copy + 3 emails + 2 SMS + 3 retargeting hooks.
prompts.quick: Draft a ‘Home Valuation + Market Update’ funnel with landing copy, 3-email nurture, SMS, and retargeting angles.

prompts.title: Neighborhood Guide Generator
prompts.deliverable: PDF outline + blog outline + social carousel notes.
prompts.quick: Produce a neighborhood guide template for [which neighborhood do you specialize in - example: South Austin, Tarrytown, or Mueller]: lifestyle, schools, commute, pricing, 5 hotspots, map idea.

prompts.title: Open House Promo Pack
prompts.deliverable: Run-of-show + assets + follow-up sequence.
prompts.quick: Create pre/during/post open house assets: IG reel script, flyer copy, sign-in CTA, follow-up text/email.

prompts.title: Referral Engine Email Series
prompts.deliverable: 4 emails + subject lines + cadence.
prompts.quick: Write a 4-email series asking your sphere of influence (past clients, friends, family) for referrals and introductions: value first, social proof, soft ask, reminder.

prompts.title: Instagram Reels Calendar (30 Days)
prompts.deliverable: Table: Day | Idea | Hook | Caption | CTA.
prompts.quick: Build a 30-day Reels plan: hooks, captions, on-screen beats, CTAs. Balance education/story/listings.

prompts.title: Brand Positioning Statement
prompts.deliverable: 1-liner + 3 proof bullets + tone/style notes.
prompts.quick: Craft a unique positioning + tagline for [please enter your target client type - example: first-time buyers, luxury condo sellers, real estate investors] in [please enter your city and state - example: Austin, TX] with proof points and voice guide.

prompts.title: Review & Social Proof System
prompts.deliverable: Templates + reminder SOP + showcase widgets.
prompts.quick: Design a post-closing review capture flow: ask script, links, reminder cadence, showcase placements.
prompts.success: ≥70% of closed clients leave a review.

prompts.title: Weekly Time Blocking Planner
prompts.deliverable: Weekly time-blocking table for agents
prompts.quick: Create a weekly time-blocking plan for [how many agents - example: just yourself, 3 agents, or 10 agents] in [your city/state]. Include prospecting, admin, client service, learning, and personal time. Output as a table.

prompts.title: Weekly Productivity Audit
prompts.deliverable: A breakdown of what to stop doing, automate, or delegate
prompts.quick: Audit calendar/tasks for a team of [how many agents are on your team - example: just yourself, 3 agents, 5 agents, or 10 agents] in [type your city and state - example: Austin, TX or Miami, FL]. Table: Task | Time | ROI | Automate/Delegate/Delete | Tool.

prompts.title: Daily Checklist Builder
prompts.deliverable: Your daily to-do list (morning, afternoon, evening)
prompts.quick: Create a 12-task daily checklist balancing pipeline/admin/prospecting/learning. Export-friendly.

prompts.title: Pipeline SOP (Lead→Close)
prompts.deliverable: Step-by-step process from lead to closed deal
prompts.quick: Define CRM stages, entry/exit criteria, tasks, SLAs, and 2 automations/stage.

prompts.title: Listing Launch Timeline (T-14→T+14)
prompts.deliverable: 28-day timeline showing what to do and when
prompts.quick: Create a listing launch Gantt with owners, assets, dependencies, compliance checks.

prompts.title: Buyer Onboarding Journey
prompts.deliverable: Welcome email + what to send buyers on day 1, 7, 14
prompts.quick: Map onboarding for [describe the buyers you typically work with - example: first-time buyers under 35, people downsizing from big homes, or real estate investors]: welcome pack, expectations, template updates.

prompts.title: Vendor Directory Framework
prompts.deliverable: Spreadsheet template to organize your vendors
prompts.quick: Sheet structure for lenders/inspectors/trades with verification cadence and disclaimers.

prompts.title: File Naming & Docs Policy
prompts.deliverable: Simple system to name and organize your files
prompts.quick: Create naming convention + folder tree + retention schedule for [which cloud storage do you use - example: Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, or iCloud].

prompts.title: Inbox & DM Triage SOP
prompts.deliverable: Rules for responding to emails and DMs fast
prompts.quick: Multi-channel response time + templates + escalation path; rules for auto-labels/tasks.

prompts.title: Post-Closing Handoff Process
prompts.deliverable: Post-close checklist (survey, gift, review request)
prompts.quick: Checklist to TC: survey, review ask, gift, anniversary automation.

prompts.title: One-Page Operating System
prompts.deliverable: Your business on one page (goals, metrics, meetings)
prompts.quick: Create a 1-pager: Vision, 90-day goals, goal metrics, meeting rhythm, org chart.
prompts.success: <30 min weekly meeting, goal metric alignment.

prompts.title: Quarterly Business Review Framework
prompts.deliverable: Quarterly review worksheet for agents
prompts.quick: Design a quarterly business review template for agents. Include sections for goals, metrics, wins, challenges, and next steps. Output as a fillable worksheet.

prompts.title: GCI Reverse-Engineering
prompts.deliverable: Exact number of calls and appointments you need each week
prompts.quick: Calculate how to hit your income goal: [what's your annual income goal - example: $150,000, $250,000, or $500,000] with an average commission per deal of [what do you typically make per transaction - example: $5,000, $8,000, or $12,000]. Get weekly activity targets using conversion rates.

prompts.title: Weekly Scorecard
prompts.deliverable: One-page scorecard to track your weekly numbers
prompts.quick: Scorecard for leading/lagging: calls, contacts, appts, contracts, posts.

prompts.title: Prospecting Habit Protocol
prompts.deliverable: Simple daily routine to build a prospecting habit
prompts.quick: Build a 20-minute daily prospecting ritual for [how do you find new clients - example: knocking on doors, calling expired listings, sending DMs on social media, or sending emails]: trigger→routine→reward.

prompts.title: Weekly Reflection Template
prompts.deliverable: Weekly check-in template (wins, numbers, what to fix)
prompts.quick: One-page review: wins, numbers, blockers, experiments, focus.

prompts.title: 30-Day Skill Sprint
prompts.deliverable: 30-day plan to master one skill (with daily practice)
prompts.quick: Design a 30-day sprint to master [which skill do you want to improve - example: making cold calls, creating social media content, giving listing presentations, or negotiating deals]: daily drills + checkpoints.

prompts.title: Goal Red-Team Exercise
prompts.deliverable: What could go wrong with your goal + how to prevent it
prompts.quick: List all the reasons you might miss [what's your big goal this year - example: closing 50 transactions, earning $250K in commissions, or signing 100 new clients] and create a plan to prevent each one.

prompts.title: Accountability Partner Rules
prompts.deliverable: Weekly check-in agenda for you and your accountability partner
prompts.quick: Create a 15-min weekly accountability agenda + commitment contract.

prompts.title: Personal P&L Dashboard
prompts.deliverable: Simple profit tracker (what you make vs. what you keep)
prompts.quick: Agent P&L: income, taxes, savings, investments; alerts <40% margin.

prompts.title: Morning Priming Prompts
prompts.deliverable: 3-minute morning routine to start your day right
prompts.quick: 3-min exercise: affirmation, visualization, gratitude, micro-goal.

prompts.title: End-of-Day Debrief
prompts.deliverable: Quick end-of-day journal prompts (3 questions)
prompts.quick: Nightly check-in: what mattered, improvements, top win; auto-log.

prompts.title: Luxury Listing Checklist
prompts.deliverable: Luxury listing prep and marketing checklist
prompts.quick: Create a step-by-step checklist for preparing, marketing, and selling a luxury property in [your city/state]. Include staging, photography, marketing channels, compliance, and client communication.
prompts.success: Sold at/above list price in ≤45 days.

prompts.title: Listing Description That Converts
prompts.deliverable: Headline + 180–300 word description + 3 CTA variations + 8–12 hashtag suggestions
prompts.quick: Write a compelling listing description for [what type of property is this - example: 3-bedroom single-family home, 2-bed downtown condo, or new-build townhome] located at [what is the full property address - example: 1234 Oak Ridge Drive] in [type your city and state - example: Austin, TX or Denver, CO]. Highlight [name 3 standout features - example: chef kitchen, rooftop deck, energy-efficient windows], include lifestyle hooks, fair housing–compliant language, and a strong call-to-action.

prompts.title: Pricing Strategy Script
prompts.deliverable: Script to explain pricing to sellers (with market data)
prompts.quick: Price talk track with comps, DOM, trends; analogy→data→position→CTA.

prompts.title: Commission Value Conversation
prompts.deliverable: How to respond when sellers ask you to lower your fee
prompts.quick: Handle ‘lower your commission’: acknowledge→value reframe→choice close.

prompts.title: FSBO Conversion Sequence
prompts.deliverable: Call and text scripts to convert for-sale-by-owner sellers
prompts.quick: Create 3 phone calls and 3 text messages to convert a for-sale-by-owner seller. Their situation: [describe their situation - example: going through a divorce and need to sell in 60 days, inherited a property and want a quick sale, or downsizing and flexible on timing]. Use compliant, professional language.

prompts.title: Competing Agent Response
prompts.deliverable: What to say when sellers are interviewing other agents
prompts.quick: Acknowledge multi-agent interviews; differentiate→proof→low-risk CTA.

prompts.title: Rate-Sensitivity Buyer Talk
prompts.deliverable: How to talk to buyers worried about interest rates
prompts.quick: Explain payment impact; discuss buy-downs/refi-later with disclaimer.

prompts.title: Multiple-Offer Strategy
prompts.deliverable: Strategy for winning in multiple-offer situations
prompts.quick: Buyer plan: prep, terms, escalation, appraisal gap, debrief.

prompts.title: Buyer Consult Deck Outline
prompts.deliverable: Slide outline for your buyer consultation meeting
prompts.quick: Slide outline: process, timeline, stats, agency, next steps.

prompts.title: Listing Refresh Plan
prompts.deliverable: Plan to revive a stale listing (new photos, price, ads)
prompts.quick: Your listing has been on the market for [how many days - example: 21 days, 30 days, 45 days, or 60 days] with low activity. Create a relaunch plan: reshoot photos, rewrite description, retarget ads, adjust price, relaunch campaign.

prompts.title: Graceful Disengagement Scripts
prompts.deliverable: 5 polite ways to fire a difficult client
prompts.quick: 5 ways to exit misaligned clients while preserving goodwill.

prompts.title: Repair Request Negotiation
prompts.deliverable: How to negotiate repairs after inspection
prompts.quick: Matrix for inspection items; fix/credit/price + sample email.

prompts.title: Client Onboarding Welcome Kit
prompts.deliverable: Welcome kit: email, checklist, FAQ, video script
prompts.quick: Create a welcome kit for new clients (buyers or sellers) including a personalized welcome email, checklist, FAQ, and intro video script. Output as a ready-to-send package.

prompts.title: White-Glove Onboarding
prompts.deliverable: Welcome email + 7-day checklist + FAQ video for new clients
prompts.quick: 3 touches in 72h: welcome, next-7-days checklist, FAQ video.

prompts.title: Weekly Update Cadence
prompts.deliverable: Weekly update template (progress, next steps, key dates)
prompts.quick: Email + text summary + CRM log: progress, next steps, key dates.

prompts.title: Bad-News Playbook
prompts.deliverable: Scripts for delivering bad news (appraisal low, inspection issues)
prompts.quick: Scripts for appraisal shortfall/inspection issues: acknowledge→facts→options→next step.

prompts.title: Move-Day Concierge
prompts.deliverable: Moving day checklist + welcome kit + follow-up surveys
prompts.quick: Checklist: utilities, vendors, locksmith, mail, welcome kit + 7/30/90 surveys.

prompts.title: Expectations Agreement
prompts.deliverable: Client agreement (communication hours, response times)
prompts.quick: Agreement: communication hours, response times, decision rights.

prompts.title: Year-1 Maintenance Series
prompts.deliverable: 4 seasonal maintenance emails for homeowners
prompts.quick: Create quarterly maintenance reminder emails for homeowners with [what type of property and weather - example: single-family homes in hot Texas summers, condos in humid Florida, or houses with snowy Colorado winters]. Include vendor recommendations.

prompts.title: Vendor Issue Escalation
prompts.deliverable: Process when vendors mess up (who to contact, timeline)
prompts.quick: Flow: client→agent→vendor→broker→legal; logging + timeline.

prompts.title: Surprise & Delight Moments
prompts.deliverable: 5 gift ideas for client milestones
prompts.quick: Plan 5 thoughtful touchpoints at key milestones. Budget per client: [how much do you spend on client gifts - example: $50, $100, or $250]. Include personalization ideas.

prompts.title: Service Recovery Templates
prompts.deliverable: Apology templates + how to fix client complaints
prompts.quick: Apology|Accountability|Remedy|Re-commit|Follow-up + public-review reply.

prompts.title: Closing-Day Story Pack
prompts.deliverable: Shot list + captions + hashtags for closing day posts
prompts.quick: Shot list, captions, hashtags, review ask + compliance note.

prompts.title: Marketing ROI Calculator
prompts.deliverable: Marketing ROI calculator for agents
prompts.quick: Calculate the ROI for your marketing campaigns. Input: budget, leads generated, deals closed, average commission. Output: ROI %, cost per lead, cost per deal.

prompts.title: 12-Month Cashflow Model
prompts.deliverable: Monthly income and expense tracker
prompts.quick: Forecast income/expenses with tax, reserves, profit targets; monthly table.

prompts.title: Marketing Budget Allocator
prompts.deliverable: How to split your marketing budget across channels
prompts.quick: Split your monthly marketing budget of [how much per month - example: $1,000, $2,500, or $5,000] across [which platforms do you advertise on - example: Facebook Ads, Google Ads, Zillow leads, or direct mail]. Include cost-per-lead targets and rules for scaling winners or cutting losers.

prompts.title: Profitability Review Audit
prompts.deliverable: Which expenses to cut + 90-day savings plan
prompts.quick: Analyze expenses by ROI; keep/cut/renegotiate + 90-day savings plan.

prompts.title: Commission Advance Tree
prompts.deliverable: When to take a commission advance (decision tree)
prompts.quick: Decision framework: cashflow, deal certainty, cost, alternatives.

prompts.title: Team Compensation Plan
prompts.deliverable: Pay structure for assistants and coordinators
prompts.quick: Comp for ISA/LA/TC: base/split/bonus/cap + retention incentives.

prompts.title: Quarterly Tax Planning
prompts.deliverable: Tax checklist + deductions + quarterly payment reminders
prompts.quick: Checklist: estimates, deductions log, retirement, receipts; reminders.

prompts.title: Investor Service Line
prompts.deliverable: Service offering for real estate investors
prompts.quick: Offering for investors: criteria, underwriting sheet, fees, deck.

prompts.title: Market Analytics Template
prompts.deliverable: Market stats dashboard with talking points
prompts.quick: Create a market statistics dashboard for [describe your specific market - example: downtown Austin condos, suburban single-family homes in Plano, or luxury estates in Scottsdale]. Include sale-to-list price ratios, days on market, months of inventory, and talking points.

prompts.title: Vendor RFP Generator
prompts.deliverable: Request for proposal template for vendors
prompts.quick: RFP template: scope, deliverables, metrics, pricing, rubric.

prompts.title: Insurance & Risk Checklist
prompts.deliverable: Insurance policies you need + renewal tracker
prompts.quick: Policies: E&O, cyber, GL, data; renewal dates; claims protocol.

prompts.title: Appraisal Gap Negotiation Script
prompts.deliverable: Appraisal gap negotiation script for agents
prompts.quick: Create a negotiation script for handling appraisal gaps (when the appraisal comes in below contract price). Include talking points for buyers and sellers, options for bridging the gap, and compliance reminders.

prompts.title: BATNA Power Map
prompts.deliverable: Backup options if this deal falls through
prompts.quick: Build your backup plan (BATNA) for this negotiation: [describe the situation - example: appraisal came in $15k low, buyer wants $10k in seller credits, or you're dealing with multiple offers]. Include risk assessment.

prompts.title: Concession Strategy Ladder
prompts.deliverable: What to give up and what to ask for in return
prompts.quick: Rank tradeables by cost to client vs value to other party.

prompts.title: Anchoring Language Framework
prompts.deliverable: How to set price expectations with words
prompts.quick: 3 anchors: data-first, emotional story, bracketed range; phrases to avoid.

prompts.title: Calibrated Question Builder
prompts.deliverable: 10 questions to uncover what the other side really wants
prompts.quick: 10 ‘how/what’ questions + labels to uncover constraints.

prompts.title: Appraisal Gap Plan
prompts.deliverable: What to do when appraisal comes in low
prompts.quick: The appraisal came in low by [how much - example: $5,000, $10,000, or $15,000]. Create a plan with these options: challenge the appraisal, adjust the price, find cash to bridge the gap, renegotiate terms, or cancel the contract.

prompts.title: Inspection Resolution Matrix
prompts.deliverable: How to handle inspection items (repair, credit, or ignore)
prompts.quick: Minor/major matrix: repair/credit/ignore with suggested language.

prompts.title: Deadline Pressure Playbook
prompts.deliverable: How to handle artificial deadlines
prompts.quick: Resist TILI deadlines: scripts, alternatives, reframes; pre-deadline checklist.

prompts.title: Deal Rescue Protocol
prompts.deliverable: How to save deals that are falling apart
prompts.quick: Save deals with financing/inspection/cold-feet issues; flow + scripts.

prompts.title: Multiple-Offer Ethics Guide
prompts.deliverable: How to handle multiple offers ethically and legally
prompts.quick: Create ethical scripts and procedures for handling multiple offers according to [your state or brokerage rules - example: Texas TREC regulations, California DRE requirements, Keller Williams policy, or eXp Realty guidelines]. Include disclosure requirements and offer management.

prompts.title: Negotiation Post-Mortem
prompts.deliverable: Review template after each negotiation
prompts.quick: Debrief: what worked, surprises, missed clues, system change; rubric.

prompts.title: Relocation Brief
prompts.deliverable: Relocation welcome pack for buyers
prompts.quick: Create a relocation brief for buyers moving to [your city/state]. Include schools, commute, rent vs buy, neighborhoods, and local tips. Output as a welcome pack.

prompts.title: Needs-Match Matrix
prompts.deliverable: Weighted table with fit scores.
prompts.quick: Create a must-have versus nice-to-have matrix for [describe your client - example: first-time buyers with a $300K budget, move-up buyers needing more space, or downsizers going from house to condo] in [type your city and state - example: Austin, TX or Portland, OR]. Include commute preferences.

prompts.title: Smart Search Strings
prompts.deliverable: Search filters to find exactly what buyers want
prompts.quick: Create MLS and portal search strings with alerts for [what is your buyer looking for - example: 3 bedroom 2 bath under $400K with a pool in the 78704 zip code, new construction 4 bedroom homes in top-rated school districts, or waterfront condos under $600K]. Set up across MLS, Zillow, and Redfin.

prompts.title: Off-Market Outreach
prompts.deliverable: Letters and emails to find off-market properties
prompts.quick: Write letters, emails, and text messages to find off-market properties in [describe your target - example: single-family homes in the Westlake neighborhood, luxury condos in downtown, or investment properties in East Austin]. Include legally compliant language and opt-out instructions.

prompts.title: New-Build vs Resale
prompts.deliverable: Side-by-side comparison for buyers
prompts.quick: Side-by-side with lifecycle cost + agent talking points.

prompts.title: Lender Options Explainer
prompts.deliverable: How to compare lenders and loan programs
prompts.quick: Compare different lenders and loan programs for a buyer with [describe their financial situation - example: 720 credit score earning $80K per year, 650 credit score earning $120K per year, or 780 credit score earning $55K per year]. Show pros and cons of each option.

prompts.title: Investor Deal Screener
prompts.deliverable: Quick calculator for investment properties
prompts.quick: Create a quick screening tool for [what's your investment strategy - example: buying properties to flip and resell, buying rentals to hold long-term, or using the BRRRR method to refinance after rehab]. Calculate cap rate, cash-on-cash return, and debt service coverage ratio.

prompts.title: Relocation Brief
prompts.deliverable: Welcome pack for buyers moving to your area
prompts.quick: Relocation pack: schools, commute, rents vs buys, neighborhoods.

prompts.title: School-Zone Navigator
prompts.deliverable: How to search by school ratings and zones
prompts.quick: Create a school-focused search guide for [describe the family - example: a couple with 2 elementary-age kids, a single parent with one teenager, or a young family planning for future children]. Include school ratings, attendance zones, and property taxes.

prompts.title: Downsizer Options Map
prompts.deliverable: Condo and townhome options for downsizers
prompts.quick: Condos/townhomes w/ accessibility, HOA insights, budgets.

prompts.title: First-Time Buyer Roadmap
prompts.deliverable: Step-by-step timeline from pre-approval to closing
prompts.quick: From pre-approval to close with expectation management scripts.

prompts.title: Referral Request Script
prompts.deliverable: Referral request scripts (email, text, call)
prompts.quick: Write a script for requesting referrals from past clients after a successful closing. Include email, text, and phone call variations. Make it friendly, professional, and easy to personalize.

prompts.title: 12-Touch Sphere Plan
prompts.deliverable: Monthly outreach plan for past clients and sphere
prompts.quick: Create a monthly outreach plan for your sphere of influence (past clients, friends, family, and vendors). Include the right channel, theme, and call-to-action for each touchpoint.

prompts.title: Home-Anniversary Automation
prompts.deliverable: Automated anniversary messages + gift tiers
prompts.quick: CRM workflow: reminder→gift tier [$25/$50/$100]→message→social post.

prompts.title: Community Spotlight Series
prompts.deliverable: 12 posts featuring local businesses
prompts.quick: Plan 12 social media posts featuring local businesses, nonprofits, and community events in [which neighborhood are you focusing on - example: Tarrytown in Austin, Hyde Park in Austin, or Westlake Hills].

prompts.title: Client-Appreciation Event
prompts.deliverable: Event planning checklist (venue, vendors, invites)
prompts.quick: Plan a client appreciation event. What kind: [describe your event - example: a summer BBQ, holiday cocktail party, spring garden tour, or fall tailgate party]. Include timeline, vendors, sponsors, and RSVP system.

prompts.title: Review-to-Referral Bridge
prompts.deliverable: How to turn 5-star reviews into referral requests
prompts.quick: Turn 5★ reviews into warm referral asks (text/email/DM).

prompts.title: Newsletter Engine
prompts.deliverable: Monthly newsletter template (market stats + tips + local picks)
prompts.quick: Monthly template: market stat, story, tip, local pick, CTA.

prompts.title: Past-Client Care Calendar
prompts.deliverable: Quarterly check-ins for past clients
prompts.quick: Quarterly touches: maintenance notes, check-ins, invites.

prompts.title: Hyperlocal Facebook Group
prompts.deliverable: How to start and grow a neighborhood Facebook group
prompts.quick: Start/moderate a local group: rules, weekly topics, promo limits.

prompts.title: Vendor Co-Marketing Kit
prompts.deliverable: Co-marketing plan with lenders and contractors
prompts.quick: Co-marketing SOP with lenders/contractors; shared content calendar.

prompts.title: 'Just Closed' Story Framework
prompts.deliverable: Template for closing day social media posts
prompts.quick: Client story → lesson → CTA format for posts and emails.

prompts.title: CRM Automation Workflow Builder
prompts.deliverable: CRM automation workflow + checklist for agents
prompts.quick: Design a CRM automation workflow for agents. Include lead capture, assignment, follow-up, reminders, and reporting. Output as a flowchart and checklist.
prompts.success: 100% leads assigned and followed up within 5 min.

prompts.title: Landing Page CRO Audit
prompts.deliverable: What's wrong with your landing page + how to fix it
prompts.quick: Audit this landing page: [paste your full website URL - example: https://yourdomain.com/home-valuation or https://yoursite.com/seller-guide]. Review headline, social proof, call-to-action, friction points, loading speed, and mobile experience. Give specific fixes with examples.

prompts.title: 7-Day Follow-Up Sequence
prompts.deliverable: Day-by-day email and text templates for new leads
prompts.quick: Create a 7-day email and text message sequence for new leads from [where did this lead come from - example: a Facebook ad, a Zillow inquiry, a referral from a past client, or someone who visited your open house]. Day-by-day copy with decision branches.

prompts.title: No-Show Prevention Flow
prompts.deliverable: Automated reminders to reduce no-shows
prompts.quick: Booking → 24h → 1h reminders + ‘what to expect’ checklist.

prompts.title: Retargeting Ad Set
prompts.deliverable: 3 Facebook ads for people who visited your site
prompts.quick: Create 3 Facebook retargeting ads (using pain points, social proof, and curiosity angles) for people who visited [which page did they look at - example: your home valuation page, seller guide download page, buyer consultation booking page, or neighborhood guide page] but didn't convert.

prompts.title: Site Chatbot Script
prompts.deliverable: Chatbot conversation flow to qualify and book leads
prompts.quick: Qualify and book leads: greeting→qualify→offer→booking→CRM tags.

prompts.title: AI Systems Stack
prompts.deliverable: Which AI tools to use and how to connect them
prompts.quick: Design an AI tools stack for [how big is your team - example: just yourself, 2 agents, 5 agents, or 10 agents]. Map out workflows, recommend specific tools, explain how they connect, and address privacy concerns.

prompts.title: Super-Prompt Trio
prompts.deliverable: 3 powerful prompts you'll use every day
prompts.quick: 3 super-prompts: Listing Pack, Seller Brief, Negotiation Coach.

prompts.title: AI Usage & Ethics Policy
prompts.deliverable: Policy for using AI ethically in your business
prompts.quick: Create an AI usage policy for [what's your brokerage name - example: RE/MAX, Keller Williams, eXp Realty, Coldwell Banker, or an independent brokerage]. Cover purpose, acceptable uses, data handling, human verification requirements, disclosure rules, and fair housing compliance.

prompts.title: Daily AI Briefing Ritual
prompts.deliverable: 10-minute daily habit to stay current on AI
prompts.quick: 10-min habit: scan sources, save, apply, share; 3 daily questions.

prompts.title: AI Market Dashboard Spec
prompts.deliverable: Automated market report dashboard
prompts.quick: KPIs (New Listings, DOM, MOI, SP/LP, $/sqft) + auto-summary + CSV/Notion embed.

prompts.title: AI Automation Blueprint
prompts.deliverable: Map of all automations for your business
prompts.quick: Map out all possible automations for [how many people on your team - example: just yourself, 2 agents, 5 agents, or 10 agents] using [which tools do you currently use - example: Follow Up Boss, Canva, Google Workspace, or Calendly]. Show triggers, actions, and time saved per week.

prompts.title: Lead Routing + Auto Follow-Up
prompts.deliverable: Automated lead assignment and follow-up
prompts.quick: Source→CRM→owner assign→SMS/email→task; include tags and SLA.

prompts.title: Post-Closing Drip (12 Mo.)
prompts.deliverable: 12-month automated email sequence for past clients
prompts.quick: Design 12-month nurture: monthly topic + personalization fields.

prompts.title: Content Repurposing Flow
prompts.deliverable: Turn 1 video into 5 social posts automatically
prompts.quick: Turn 1 long video/blog into 5 assets via AI + schedulers.

prompts.title: Transaction Status Bot
prompts.deliverable: Automated status updates for clients
prompts.quick: Status change → templated client updates via SMS/email.

prompts.title: Smart Scheduling Sync
prompts.deliverable: Connect your calendar to your contact database
prompts.quick: Calendly↔Google↔CRM; reminders + logging; double-book prevention.

prompts.title: AI Email → Task
prompts.deliverable: Automatically create tasks from emails
prompts.quick: Classify Gmail → create tasks in Todoist/Notion with GPT descriptors.

prompts.title: Weekly Metrics Summary Bot
prompts.deliverable: Automated weekly stats email
prompts.quick: Compile leads/showings/offers into Slack/email with graph.

prompts.title: Auto Social Posting
prompts.deliverable: Automatically post new listings to social media
prompts.quick: New listing/closing/blog → caption via AI → publish → log.

prompts.title: '/delegate' Task Assistant
prompts.deliverable: Automated task creation system for your virtual assistant
prompts.quick: Slash-command creates detailed tasks with GPT expansion.

prompts.title: Market Data Source Finder
prompts.deliverable: Top 10 sources for market data and stats
prompts.quick: Find the top 10 sources for market data at [what level do you need - example: national housing trends, Texas state-level statistics, Austin metro area data, or downtown Seattle neighborhood-specific information]. Include how often each updates and best use cases.

prompts.title: Realtor Blog Curator
prompts.deliverable: 15 best blogs for real estate agents
prompts.quick: Top 15 blogs for real estate/marketing/AI; why valuable + frequency.

prompts.title: YouTube Channel Radar
prompts.deliverable: 15 best YouTube channels for agents
prompts.quick: Top 15 channels for sales/AI/branding/tech; best playlists.

prompts.title: Podcast Playbook
prompts.deliverable: 15 best podcasts for real estate professionals
prompts.quick: Top 15 podcasts; theme, length, why listen; weekly schedule.

prompts.title: Substack/Newsletter Watchlist
prompts.deliverable: 10 must-read newsletters
prompts.quick: 10 must-subscribe AI+RE newsletters; focus + frequency + value.

prompts.title: Social Expert Tracker
prompts.deliverable: 20 experts to follow on social media
prompts.quick: Top 20 LinkedIn/X/IG/TikTok accounts; niche + notable insights.

prompts.title: Realtor News Portal Guide
prompts.deliverable: 10 news sources for housing and policy
prompts.quick: 10 news outlets for housing/policy/tech; bias/slant + usage tips.

prompts.title: Trend Watch Prompt
prompts.deliverable: Weekly prompt to discover emerging trends
prompts.quick: Weekly search/prompt template to find emerging AI/housing trends.

prompts.title: Local Intelligence Dashboard
prompts.deliverable: Track local development and economic data
prompts.quick: Create a local intelligence dashboard tracking building permits, zoning changes, new developments, and major employers for [type your city or county - example: Austin TX, Travis County, Seattle WA, or Orange County CA].

prompts.title: Personal Learning Roadmap (6 mo.)
prompts.deliverable: 6-month learning plan (what to read, watch, practice)
prompts.quick: Month-by-month plan mixing blogs, podcasts, YouTube, newsletters, AI practice.

metadata.description: AI Prompt Vault for Real Estate - Auto-exported prompt library
metadata.usage: Search by category, personalize with your market, niche, tools.
